properties.hrmessage2: This is the overall employee's health record for your region
properties.question1: 1. Do you have any of the following symptoms?
properties.fever: * A fever within the last 72 hours?
properties.cough: * Cough, shortness of breath, or breathing difficulties in the last 14 days?
properties.chills: * Chills, muscle pain, headache, sore throat, or a new loss of taste or smell in the last 14 days?
properties.choose: Please choose NO, If you feel that your symptoms are due to a pre-existing condition other than COVID-19.
properties.question2: 2. Have you been in close personal contact within the last 14 days, who is a suspect COVID-19 case with test results pending or confirmed by a health care provider ?
properties.thankyoumessage: For providing your Health Information!  We Appreciate your Effort.
properties.question3: 3. Have you, or anyone with whom you have had close personal contact, travelled within the last 14 days? If so, please list what locations
properties.certconf: I certify that the information submitted in this application is true and correct to the best of my knowledge and I accept Ingredionâ€™s
properties.termsmessage: If the answer to ANY of the above questions is YES, notify the person who gave you this form. He or she will explain how you can provide additional information. Depending on the additional information you provide, you may still be permitted onsite. If you wish to provide additional information, please provide your contact information on the back of this form. As part of these screening procedures, we will collect travel and health-related information from you, including your temperature and information about any COVID-19-like symptoms or exposure you or your family have experienced, and we will use that information for the purposes of ensuring a safe work place, fulfilling our public health obligations, and/or the administration of health benefits
properties.pclph: Please update your current location and phone number
properties.pnrl: Phone number should only contain numbers minimum 5 digits and maximum 12 digits
